txt.en: Seek out Narlinn and tell her of your accomplishments.

'Ah [placeholder], greetings again. I hope your wanderings have not proven too difficult in recent days, but I have collected rumour of a number of your more recent quests and travails in the lands of Ered Luin - but I would prefer to hear them from you first-hand. While rumour moves swift as the wind and is doubtless more amusing than fact, I prefer to know the latter before crafting my songs, particularly when they must weather the tide of ages among my people in the far halls of the West.'

Earning the trust of the peoples of Ered Luin is no simple matter, for the Elves and dwarves here have long distrusted each other, and it leaves them with little love for strangers. Nevertheless, your deeds in these lands have made great inroads, and your name has become known among both peoples.
